text: FUZZY CHECKPOINTS A fuzzy checkpoint is where the DBMS allows active txns to continue the run while the system flushes dirty pages to disk. New log records to track checkpoint boundaries: : Indicates start of checkpoint : Contains ATT + DPT. —S | SZCMU-DB 4 » PI o) 47:32/1:18:06 - DIRTY PAGE TABLE > ® « 2 I e e - 21 - ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
